head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOING, MARY ANN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOING, MARY ANN

block.p: GOING-Mary Ann. Beloved sister of the late Patricia Going Plante, James, Robert and Eileen Going Foy. Also survived by 13 nephews and nieces. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Ave at 81 St, Wednesday 7 to 9 PM and Thursday 2 to 5 and 7 to 9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial Friday, 10 AM at St. Patrick's Cathedral, Fifth Avenue at 50th Street, NYC. Interment Calvary Cemetery.
